blogPost.excerpt: Library of Diversity is a space for meaningful conversations that connects people across the globe through video-conference to share stories that promote diversity and inclusion.
blogPost.body: Library of Diversity is a space for meaningful conversations that connects people across the globe through video-conference to share stories that promote diversity and inclusion.
blogPost.title: Library of Diversity - A place where books are people and reading is a conversation
blogPost.author: Pavan BG

localize.description: 多样性图书馆是一个进行有意义对话的空间，通过视频会议将全球各地的人们联系起来，分享促进多样性和包容性的故事。
localize.tagline: 在这里，书是人，阅读是一种对话。

localize.description: 多樣性圖書館是一個進行有意義對話的空間，通過視頻會議將全球各地的人們聯繫起來，分享促進多樣性和包容性的故事。
localize.tagline: 在這裏，書是人，閱讀是一種對話。

previous.excerpt: Join thousands of people who’ve switched from WordPress to Webflow. Make the change today.

加入成千上萬從WordPress轉到Webflow的人的行列。今天就做出改變吧。

next.excerpt: Keep records of all your cash flows in multi-platform application, get notified for actions taken on your transactions, mention the debtor/creditor, analyze your transaction history, view detailed reports and one-one reports and optimize your flow of cash.
next.title: IOU-Money - Manage and explore your debit and credit transaction flow

localize.description: 在多平台应用中记录您所有的现金流，在您的交易中得到行动通知，提及债务人/债权人，分析您的交易历史，查看详细的报告和一对一的报告，优化您的现金流。
localize.tagline: 管理和探索您的借贷交易流程。

localize.description: 在多平臺應用中記錄您所有的現金流，在您的交易中得到行動通知，提及債務人/債權人，分析您的交易歷史，查看詳細的報告和一對一的報告，優化您的現金流。
localize.tagline: 管理和探索您的借貸交易流程。
